project.name: E-commerce Product Launch
project.description: End-to-end business plan for launching a direct-to-consumer e-commerce brand, covering customer segments, product features, data model, marketing channels, and risk management.

data.title: Launch Brief
data.body: Direct-to-consumer brand launching a curated product line online. Phase 1: Shopify storefront with 20 SKUs, email marketing, and Instagram/TikTok acquisition. Goal: $50K revenue in first quarter with < $30 CAC.

data.name: Casual Shopper
data.painPoints: Overwhelmed by choices on Amazon. Wants curated, trustworthy recommendations. Price-sensitive but willing to pay more for quality + brand story.

data.name: Brand Loyalist
data.painPoints: Wants to feel part of a community. Expects VIP treatment, early access, and personalized recommendations based on purchase history.

data.name: Curated Storefront
data.description: Clean, story-driven product pages with lifestyle photography, ingredient/material breakdowns, and social proof. Mobile-first design.
data.userStory: As a casual shopper, I want to quickly understand why this product is worth it so I can decide without reading 50 reviews.

data.name: Subscribe & Save
data.description: Monthly subscription boxes with 10% discount. Customizable frequency and product selection. Skip/pause anytime.
data.userStory: As a loyal customer, I want to auto-receive my favorites monthly so I never run out and save money.

data.name: Referral Program
data.description: Give $10, get $10 referral system. Unique shareable links. Track referral conversions and reward payouts.
data.userStory: As a happy customer, I want to share a referral link with friends so we both benefit.

data.name: Customer
data.description: Unified customer profile combining Shopify customer data, email engagement, and purchase history.

data.name: Order
data.description: Transaction record with line items, discount codes applied, shipping status, and fulfillment tracking.

data.name: Instagram + TikTok
data.notes: Organic content + paid ads. UGC-focused creative. Influencer micro-partnerships (10-50K followers). Target CPA: < $15.

data.name: Email / Klaviyo
data.notes: Welcome series (5 emails), abandoned cart recovery, post-purchase flow, VIP early access. Target: 30% of revenue from email.

data.name: SEO & Content
data.notes: Buying guides, ingredient deep-dives, lifestyle blog. Long-tail keywords targeting 'best [category] for [use case]'.

data.name: Quarterly Revenue
data.measurement: Shopify Analytics â€” gross revenue minus refunds. Tracked weekly with cumulative target line.

data.name: Customer Acq. Cost
data.measurement: Total ad spend / new customers acquired. Blended across all paid channels.

data.name: Repeat Purchase Rate
data.measurement: % of customers who place a 2nd order within 90 days. Tracked in Shopify customer reports.

data.name: Inventory Overstock
data.mitigation: Start with small batches (50-100 units per SKU). Use pre-orders to gauge demand before bulk manufacturing. Negotiate return clauses with suppliers.

data.name: Rising Ad Costs
data.mitigation: Diversify beyond paid social. Invest in organic/SEO and email. Build referral flywheel. Target 50% of traffic from non-paid sources by month 6.

data.name: Shipping Delays
data.mitigation: Use 2 fulfillment partners (primary + backup). Set customer expectations with realistic delivery windows. Offer tracking + proactive delay notifications.

data.name: Tech Implementation
data.notes: Shopify theme customization, Klaviyo integration, analytics dashboard setup, and referral system implementation.
